trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when one or more errors occur during composition in a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class with the specified collection of composition errors.
A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> objects that represent problems during composition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class with the specified error message.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.Exception.Message"></xref> property to its default value.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> class with the specified error message and the exception that is the cause of this exception.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.Exception.Message"></xref> property to its default value.

The exception that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref> property to `null`.

Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> objects that describe the errors associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref>.

A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> objects that describe the errors associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionException"></xref>.
Gets a message that describes the exception.
Gets a collection that contains the initial sources of this exception.
A collection that contains the initial sources of this exception.
